name.baseName: Aluminum ingot casting ; Primary aluminum ingot ; Liquid primary aluminum ; 2011
铝锭铸造 ; 原生铝锭 ; 液态原铝 ; 2011年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This dataset describes the process of casting primary aluminum ingots from liquid primary aluminum, specific to the operations used in 2011. The primary aluminum ingots are typically used as a raw material in various industries, including automotive, construction, and packaging, where the properties of aluminum such as lightweight, strength, and corrosion resistance are required.
该数据集描述了2011年液态原铝铸造成原生铝锭的过程。原生铝锭通常用作各种行业的原材料，包括汽车、建筑和包装行业，在这些行业中需要铝的轻质、强度和抗腐蚀性质。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset describes the process of casting primary aluminum ingots from liquid primary aluminum, specific to the operations used in 2011. The primary aluminum ingots are typically used as a raw material in various industries, including automotive, construction, and packaging, where the properties of aluminum such as lightweight, strength, and corrosion resistance are required.
该数据集描述了2011年液态原铝铸造成原生铝锭的过程。原生铝锭通常用作各种行业的原材料，包括汽车、建筑和包装行业，在这些行业中需要铝的轻质、强度和抗腐蚀性质。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), users should note that process-specific data pertains to the year 2011 and may not accurately represent current practices. Data users should ensure the PA (primary aluminum) and SA (secondary aluminum) data are appropriate for their specific context and take into account technological improvements or changes in industry since 2011. The background data sourced from the CAS RCEES 2018 Chinese localization should be used thoughtfully, considering its geographic and temporal relevance to the assessed process.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估(LCA)时，用户应注意特定过程数据涉及2011年，并且可能无法准确反映当前的实践。数据用户应确保PA（原生铝）和SA（再生铝）数据适用于其具体情境，并考虑自2011年以来工业技术的改进或变化。源自2018年CAS RCEES中国本土化的背景数据应考虑其对评估过程的地理和时间相关性，谨慎使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
